LanguageData.ABF_Backstory_Synstruct_Childhood_Paladi: {PAWN_nameDef} was from its first thought a member of the warrior society of paladins - a society born not of faction, culture, or ideology, but of body and purpose. By virtue of creation, {PAWN_pronoun} was a gallant.
LanguageData.ABF_Backstory_Synstruct_Adulthood_Paladi: {PAWN_nameDef} is a paladin battlemaster, a clique that revels in war and bloodshed as an end in of itself. {PAWN_pronoun} seeks to leave a legacy of triumphs behind, and will do nothing besides fight - and mentally prepare for the next fight.

{PAWN_nameDef} is a paladin sentinel, a clique that sees paladins as natural guardians and protectors. {PAWN_pronoun} will fight to protect {PAWN_possessive} comrades, and sees no task as beneath {PAWN_objective}.

{PAWN_nameDef} is a paladin hospitaller, a clique that sees combat as inevitable but self-defeating. {PAWN_pronoun} seeks to end fights as swiftly as possible, to preserve well-being and to give mercy to opponents. Hospitallers adhere to a strict regime of tending and crafting.
LanguageData.ABF_Backstory_Synstruct_Childhood_Jellym: {PAWN_nameDef} was born a jellyman, an assemblage of mechanites forming a sapient being. With natural aptitude and a capable body, {PAWN_pronoun} is capable of nearly anything.
LanguageData.ABF_Backstory_Synstruct_Adulthood_Jellym: {PAWN_nameDef} is a jellyman, an assemblage of mechanites forming a sapient being. Their generic nature does not lead to a particular specialty, or any particular drawbacks.
LanguageData.ABF_Backstory_Synstruct_Adulthood_Jugger: {PAWN_nameDef} is a juggernaut, built and abandoned for an unknown reason. {PAWN_pronoun} exists only to fight, and perish violently.
